content: From the shrine, head up the path through the mountain. Compared to the previous chapter, you'll find this area much more linear like in Chapter 1.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Frost-Clad Path'.
The content is as follows:
From the shrine, head up the path through the mountain. Compared to the previous chapter, you'll find this area much more linear like in Chapter 1.
